participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, Emily is excited about her new journey as a mother of triplets.
participant_1.background: i just moved into my first home. i am expecting triplets in three months. a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Passionate and creative, Michael enjoys sharing his love for music with others and finds joy in helping those in need.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i am a piano teacher on the side. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally.
